title: lakefront land for Sale
details:
Bolgoda lakefront land in Katubedda, Moratuwa.
Luxurious, quite neighbourhood with a great relaxing view
56 Perch land. 16 perch reservation so pay only for 40 perch.

1.35 mil per perch
Full land 1.35 x 40 = 54 mil

Slightly negotiable

Call Rohan 0714313662 for more info
